product.name: HP ENVY Spectre XT
product.description: The Ultrabook™ for those who want style without sacrificing substance.
product.details_header: Thin and light with premium materials unlike anything you've seen from HP. Carry less. Do more.

ul.li: Thin and light with premium materials unlike anything you've seen from HP. Carry less. Do more.
HP Support Assistant, MyRoom, CoolSense, and TrueVision HD Webcam.*
HP Imagepad: Simply touch to scroll, zoom, and rotate images and web pages.
Beats Audio™: Designed for the best sounding, richest audio available on a PC.
2-year Norton™ Internet Security and 1-year Absolute Data Protect subscriptions; Adobe® Photoshop® and Premiere® Elements preinstalled; HP Platinum Support.

font.i: *Internet access required. Sold separately. HD content required to view HD images.
